mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTR(psid,0,INSTR(psid, '_')-1) as "pid" FROM order_item WHERE oid in (SELECT oid FROM orders WHERE to_char(odate, 'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yy/mm/dd'))

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') as "odate", count(oid) as "ocount", sum(oafterprice) as "totalprice" FROM orders GROUP BY TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy/mm/dd') HAVING TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd')

SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yy/mm/dd') as "odate", count(oid) as "ocount", sum(oafterprice) as "totalprice" FROM orders WHERE ostatus = '주문취소' GROUP BY TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy/mm/dd') HAVING TO_CHAR(odate,'yyyy/mm/dd') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'yyyy/mm/dd')
SELECT * FROM DAILY_STATISTICS FETCH NEXT 30 ROWS ONLY
SELECT * FROM MONTHLY_STATISTICS FETCH NEXT 12 ROWS ONLY

SELECT to_char(odate,'hh24') as "odate", count(oid) as "ocount", sum(oafterprice) as "totalprice" FROM orders WHERE to_char(odate,'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate,'yy/mm/dd') GROUP BY to_char(odate,'hh24') ORDER BY to_char(odate,'hh24') ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET ostatus=#{status} WHERE oid=#{oids}
